subject: Public Speaking
title: The Pause Before the Climax
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Pause Before the Climax.

hook.text: Right before the big moment, stop. Let silence build.

buildup.text: The pause before climax is the most powerful moment in a speech.

discovery.text: Audiences hold their breath. Tension reaches its peak.

twist.text: This technique transforms good stories into unforgettable ones.

climax.text: Great speakers master timing. The pause IS the technique.

punchline.text: Pause before revealing. Silence is tension.

quiz.question: Why pause before climax?
options: Builds maximum tension before the reveal
